TopicTitle: Concave Mesh Colliders Converted to Convex in Latest Update.

Articles.Content:
For those who don't know any mesh collider you had marked as concave will be automatically converted to convex with the latest update.

This explains a lot of exploding issues for fairings and decouplers.

If you want concave collision your going to have to build it out of a bunch of little boxes or convex meshes.
